## Events.VarTypeChange.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `VarTypeChange` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(variable?: IVariableModel<IVariableState>, oldType?: string | undefined, newType?: string | undefined);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  variable | [IVariableModel](./blockly.ivariablemodel.md)<!-- -->&lt;[IVariableState](./blockly.ivariablestate.md)<!-- -->&gt; | _(Optional)_ The variable whose type changed. Undefined for a blank event. |
|  oldType | string \| undefined | _(Optional)_ The old type of the variable. Undefined for a blank event. |
|  newType | string \| undefined | _(Optional)_ The new type of the variable. Undefined for a blank event. |
